## Vijay Venkatraman

I'm an experienced AI leader specializing in Generative AI, currently working at DocuSign in the San Francisco Bay Area. My expertise spans across Search, Q&A, NLP, and Large Language Models (LLMs).

- **Large Language Models**: Training, fine-tuning, and deploying LLMs at scale
- **Search & NLP**: Developing advanced search and natural language processing solutions
- **AI Product Strategy**: Leading AI teams and driving product innovation
